product_name: Canari Single Track Baggy Bike Shorts - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Headed to Moab? Hit the slickrock in comfort in the men's Canari Single Track Baggy Bike Shorts. After your ride, you can remove the liner brief with its chamois and hit the town.
